title: DataTableListPicker

PickerItems.description: An array of items for this picker. It can be simple key and value items. Currently, the display value must be unique for iOS platform

Value.description: When not specified or not found in the `PickerItems` no selection is made. An array of the above values can be used to specify multiple selection.

description: A list picker allows the selection of one option among values within a defined category.
